title: Wan Sheng Jie 2 (All Saints Street 2)
synopsis: Dear Mom and Dad, it's already been a year since I left home. Don't worry- I'm doing great! I can take care of myself now. And I've learned to take care of others, too. Before, I never could have imagined having so many friends. But now, I can hardly imagine living without them. I think... Here, is my second home.
characters: ['Bowman, Neil', 'Blood, Ira', 'Angel, Lynn', 'Kirilenko, Vladimir Eliot', 'Holt, Nick', 'Angel, Lily', 'Abu']
